# Your free wedding website and so much more.

Create a wedding website that is uniquely yours, completely customizable, and anticipates all your wedding planning needs.

## Powerful Event Privacy

## Keep it under wraps.

Use your wedding guest list to manage who sees what on your site.

### Personalized schedules for each of your guests

Rehearsal dinner? Secret post-wedding breakfast? Invite specific guests without having to explain to others why they didnât get the memo.

### Password protect particular pages

Choose which pages are visible to everyone and which require your wedding password for access.

![Map](data:image/png;base64,iVBORw0KGgoAAAANSUhEUgAAAAEAAAABCAQAAAC1HAwCAAAAC0lEQVR42mP8Xw8AAoMBgDTD2qgAAAAASUVORK5CYII=)

## Guest Travel Tools

## Donât trip over travel.

![Travel booking assistant](data:image/png;base64,iVBORw0KGgoAAAANSUhEUgAAAAEAAAABCAQAAAC1HAwCAAAAC0lEQVR42mP8Xw8AAoMBgDTD2qgAAAAASUVORK5CYII=)

### Booking Assistant

### Let attendees book accommodations from your site.

Help your guests easily find and book accommodations at the best rates through major travel sites.

![Travel recommendations](data:image/png;base64,iVBORw0KGgoAAAANSUhEUgAAAAEAAAABCAQAAAC1HAwCAAAAC0lEQVR42mP8Xw8AAoMBgDTD2qgAAAAASUVORK5CYII=)

### Travel Recommendations

### Make sure guests' travel wonât unravel.

From hotel blocks to airport details, transit schedules to shuttle info, share every little thing. Even list the best spots to grab a beer or burger.

![Map directions](data:image/png;base64,iVBORw0KGgoAAAANSUhEUgAAAAEAAAABCAQAAAC1HAwCAAAAC0lEQVR42mP8Xw8AAoMBgDTD2qgAAAAASUVORK5CYII=)![Request ride](data:image/png;base64,iVBORw0KGgoAAAANSUhEUgAAAAEAAAABCAQAAAC1HAwCAAAAC0lEQVR42mP8Xw8AAoMBgDTD2qgAAAAASUVORK5CYII=)![Request ride](data:image/png;base64,iVBORw0KGgoAAAANSUhEUgAAAAEAAAABCAQAAAC1HAwCAAAAC0lEQVR42mP8Xw8AAoMBgDTD2qgAAAAASUVORK5CYII=)

### Map and App Integrations

### Map it all out for your guests.

Allow your guests to easily get driving directions with Google Maps integrated into your schedule. They can even hail a ride with Uber and Lyft directly from your app.

## Still have questions?

Joy seems to offer a lot of different features. Can I pick and choose what to use?

Most definitely. We designed Joy's wedding website builder to accommodate weddings of all shapes and sizes. You can remove any functionality of Joy that does not apply to your wedding. Don't have a wedding party? Don't want a wedding day countdown? Simply remove a section from your dashboard and it will automatically be removed from your website and app.

Can I customize my wedding site for particular guests, for example my wedding party or rehearsal dinner guests?

Yes, you can edit your schedule visibility so only particular wedding events and their details are shown to only specific guests. You can also add password protection to all sections of your site so only guests can see your wedding info.

Can I use my website in stages? Meaning, can I have some information live and not others?

You can absolutely update your website at any time. If you have any information that has yet to be resolved, feel free to put a TBD or remove it for the time being. Your guests will not be updated if you make changes automatically, but you can send out an email from our platform to let them know.

Do you support custom domains?

Yes, you can purchase a domain name directly from Joy (or use a domain you already have) and set it up to forward to your withjoy.com URL when someone visits that domain.

Can I use the website without the app?

You can use Joy to create your wedding website and not share the download links to install your wedding app. However, if you want your guests to be able to upload photos to your website, they will need the app.

What do I need to open a Joy account?

You can create a Joy account using either your email or Facebook.

What should be on a wedding website?

The basic function of a wedding website is to communicate all the important details your guests need to know about your big day, including your wedding date, location, dress codes, and gift registries. Check out our [19 Tips for Building a Perfect Wedding Website](https://withjoy.com/blog/wedding-website-tips/) for more inspiration and guidance.

When I share my website with someone, what can they see?

When your guest receives their invitation, theyâll see a personalized version of your wedding site. That means theyâll see the schedule theyâre meant to see alongside the pages youâve allowed them access to.

Can I customize the pages that appear on my website?

Yes! Joy allows you to create custom wedding website pages, or even adapt your site for other important events such as anniversaries, birthday parties, and baby showers.

How to create the perfect wedding website with Joy?

Planning a wedding is like embarking on a grand adventure â thrilling, nerve-wracking, and full of surprises. Every detail, from the venue to the guest list, plays a crucial role in shaping the day youâll remember for the rest of your life. Amidst the whirlwind of decisions, one aspect is necessary: your wedding website. When it comes to creating a personalized, stress-free online space to share your love story and manage your wedding logistics, Joyâs Wedding Websites is your ultimate companion.   
  
**Designing Your Unique Love Story**   
  
Your wedding website is the digital embodiment of your love storyâa canvas on which you can paint the picture of your journey together. With Joyâs Free Wedding Websites, youâre not just choosing a template; youâre curating an experience that reflects your style, personality, and the essence of your relationship. Explore various stunning design templates, from timeless classics to contemporary marvels, and let your creativity run wild.  
  
What sets Joyâs Wedding Websites apart is its commitment to customization. Whether a design maven or a novice, the platform offers intuitive tools that empower you to tailor every aspect of your website. You can make your website yours by selecting the perfect font to fine-tuning the color palette.   
  
**Simplify Your Wedding Planning**   
  
Planning a wedding involves juggling multiple tasks and managing countless details â a daunting prospect for even the most organized couples. Fortunately, Joyâs Wedding Websites has an arsenal of smart features to streamline your planning process. Personalized schedules allow you to map out every aspect of your wedding events, from the rehearsal dinner to the post-wedding brunch, and customize access for your guests. Tired of answering the same questions repeatedly? Say hello to the guest Q&A feature, where you can create a comprehensive FAQ section covering everything from attire suggestions to transportation details.   
  
**Facilitating Guest Travel**   
  
Your wedding day is a celebration shared with cherished friends and family, many of whom may be traveling from afar to join you. Joyâs Wedding Websites makes it effortless to provide them with essential travel information, ensuring a seamless and stress-free experience. From hotel recommendations to transit schedules, guests can access all the details they need to plan their trip directly from your website. The integrated map feature offers turn-by-turn directions, while the companion mobile app keeps guests informed on the go. Booking accommodations directly through your site can ensure your guests find the best rates without hassle.   
  
**Effortless Guest Management**   
  
Managing your guest list can be a logistical nightmare, but Joyâs Free Wedding Websites simplifies the process with intuitive guest management tools. The connected guest list feature allows you to collect addresses seamlessly, import guest lists, send messages, and track RSVPs.  
  
Group your guests, assign plus ones and organize them with tags to ensure everyone is accounted for. With powerful event privacy settings, you can control who sees what on your website, safeguarding your privacy while keeping your guests informed.   
  
**Capturing Memories to Last a Lifetime**   
  
Your wedding day is more than just a ceremony â a celebration of love shared with the people who matter most to you. Joyâs Wedding Websites helps you capture and share those precious moments with your guests, ensuring your special day is in their memories forever.  
  
From sharing your unique love story to introducing your wedding party with personalized bios, you can infuse your website with the joy and excitement of your journey together. Matching stationery, including Save the Dates and invitations, available as eCards or prints, can create a cohesive and coordinated experience for your guests.   
  
**Start with the essentials.**   
  
Building a perfect wedding website online is crucial for todayâs couples, offering a streamlined platform to communicate essential details and enhance the overall guest experience. Start by prioritizing informing and delighting your guests through a thoughtful approach to content organization.  
  
Begin with the basics, ensuring that crucial information such as your name, wedding date, location, and key event timings are prominently featured. Providing a clear event timeline, including pre-ceremony gatherings and post-wedding festivities, you keep guests informed and help them plan their attendance effectively. Utilize customizable scheduling features to maintain privacy for exclusive events like rehearsal dinners. Address common queries preemptively with an FAQ page, covering topics from parking to dress code, to ease guest concerns and streamline communication.  
  
Delight your guests by going beyond mere information dissemination. Introduce your wedding party with personal details and photos to foster familiarity among guests. Maintain a cohesive theme across all aspects of your wedding, from invitations to website design, to create a unified and memorable experience. Enhance visual appeal with professional photography, capturing key moments and emotions to engage your audience. While including a registry page, emphasize gratitude over gifts, underscoring the importance of their presence.  
  
Lastly, consider the extra touches that elevate your website from functional to exceptional. Set clear guidelines for social media usage and photography to respect the sanctity of certain moments. Recommend local activities to extend guest enjoyment and make their visit truly memorable. Incorporate multimedia elements such as videos to share your love story and engagement journey, adding depth to your websiteâs narrative. Share a brief yet heartfelt account of your meeting to add a personal touch. Lastly, acknowledge the contributions of vendors who bring your wedding vision to life, fostering a sense of community and appreciation.

What essential elements should I include on my Joy wedding website?

Your Joy wedding website should include an online RSVP system, detailed wedding information (date, time, location), event schedules, engagement photos, and registry details. You can also add personal touches like your love story and FAQs for guests.

When is the ideal time to create my wedding website?

It's best to create your Joy wedding website as soon as you've set your wedding date and secured your venue. This allows you to share important details with guests early on, typically 6-8 months before the wedding.

How can I ensure my wedding website remains private?

Joy offers various privacy settings. You can password-protect specific pages or your entire site, control whether your event appears in search results, and manage guest visibility for different sections of your website.

Can I customize the design of my Joy wedding website?

Yes, Joy provides extensive customization options. You can choose from various templates, customize colors and fonts, and even switch layouts at any time. The platform allows you to preview your design on both desktop and mobile devices.

How does Joy's photo-sharing feature work?

Joy's photo features creates a shared photo album where guests can upload pictures before, during, and after the wedding. These photos are automatically arranged into a collage and can be displayed as a real-time slideshow during your reception. All images are stored in high resolution and available for download anytime.

How do I create a wedding website?

Creating your wedding website with Joy is simple and free. Sign up at withjoy.com/wedding-website, choose a design that matches your wedding style, and add key details such as your story, event information, travel details, and photos. You can enable online RSVPs and manage your guest list in one place, then share your website link with guests via text, email, or save-the-date cards.

What are the best features for a wedding website?

The best wedding websites provide everything you needâeasy RSVP and guest list management to track responses and meal preferences, detailed pages for ceremony and reception info with maps and accommodations, the ability to link your Joy Registry or any other registry, photo galleries and story sections for personal touches, privacy controls like password protection, and mobile-friendly designs that look great on any device. All these features are free with Joy.

How much does it cost to create a wedding website?

With Joy, your wedding website is completely freeâincluding RSVP tools, templates, and hosting. You can also purchase a custom domain (like yournameswedding.com) from a domain provider, which typically costs between $20 and $40 per year.

What does Joy cost?

Joy wedding websites, planning tools, and registry are free. Online Save the Dates and invitations have hundreds of free designs, as well as premium paid designs.

Do you have a support team we can reach out to if we have questions?

Absolutely! Our amazing support team works hard around the clock, every day of the week, including weekends, to make sure that your questions are answered. You can send us an email at [support@withjoy.com](mailto:support@withjoy.com).

#### Wedding Websites by Joy

Your wedding day should be one of the happiest moments of your life â but we know the planning process can sometimes feel overwhelming. Even the simplest celebrations require thoughtful coordination, and the last thing you want is to juggle endless details without help. Thatâs where Joy steps in.

With a free, customizable wedding website from Joy, you can share all the important details with guests in one beautiful, easy-to-use space â no printing costs, no endless email chains. Joyâs wedding websites are designed to match your love story, whether your style is classic and timeless, modern and chic, or somewhere in between.

Browse our thoughtfully crafted designs, grouped by style, theme, or color palette. Choose one that matches your wedding vibe, then make it your own with our simple, guided customization tools.

Add your names, wedding date, ceremony and reception details, and even a meaningful quote or fun story about your relationship. Joyâs smart design system ensures that fonts, layouts, and colors work beautifully together, but youâre free to play with font pairings, layouts, and color themes to match your exact vision.

Personalize your site further by uploading engagement or couple photos â simply drag and drop them into place. Crop, rearrange, or enhance them with Joyâs built-in editing tools. You can even add decorative accents like illustrations, frames, or icons that match your theme.

#### Why Couples Choose Joy's Wedding Website Tools

\- All-in-one planning â Integrate RSVPs, your registry, travel info, and more in one place.

\- Mobile-friendly â Your guests can easily access your wedding details from any device.

\- Free and secure â Joy's websites are 100% free with built-in privacy controls.

\- Matches your theme â Designs that complement your colors, vibe, and story.

\- Creating RSVP questions and follow-ups - Joy's RSVP system goes beyond basic attendance confirmation. By default, guests will be asked about attendance, meal preferences, hotel rooms, rehearsal attendance, mailing address, and their connection to you.

\- Add Your Wedding Schedule and Details - Your wedding website's schedule section serves as the foundation that gives guests all the key details about your big day. Joy's wedding website turns into a live itinerary that directs guests through each moment of your celebration. You can create your wedding schedule on Joy by accessing the admin dashboard, clicking "Edit Pages," and selecting "Schedule". This takes you to the master schedule page where you'll find all your wedding events. You can add details about dress code expectations and smartphone policies during the event.

\- Display event times and locations - The correct time zone for each event matters. Your guests will see accurate times no matter where they are. If you're planning multi-day celebrations across different cities, each event needs its own time zone setting.

\- Customize visibility for each guest - Joy's wedding website stands out by letting you personalize what each guest sees. Your guests will view a custom version of your site that shows only the events they're invited to.

#### Conclusion

Joy wedding websites stand out as the perfect solution for couples who want to make their wedding planning simpler. This piece shows how Joy combines everything you need for wedding coordination on one user-friendly platform. Joy handles all your planning needs without charging anything - from customizable templates to smart RSVP systems.

Joy's real value comes from knowing how to match your specific vision. You can switch between layouts, change designs, and update information anytime before the big day. On top of that, the platform's guest management tools get rid of the usual spreadsheet mess in wedding planning.

The registry feature is worth highlighting since it brings together gifts from hundreds of retailers and offers zero-fee cash funds. This smart setup saves time and cuts down frustration for you and your guests.

Joy creates a shared digital space that brings everyone into your celebration. Your loved ones can stay connected through photo-sharing timelines, messaging, and livestreaming options - no matter where they are.

Keep in mind that Joy's privacy controls will keep your wedding details safe. You get full control over who sees what by password-protecting specific pages while keeping others public.

Your wedding needs a digital home that matches how special it is. Joy wedding websites make this happen without adding stress to your planning. Build your site today and see how Joy turns wedding coordination from overwhelming to fun!
